name: arxivreader
description: A Node.js project for reading and processing arXiv papers with web interface

scripts.backend: source venv/bin/activate && cd src/backend && python3 api_server.py
scripts.dev: concurrently "node --watch src/index.js" "source venv/bin/activate && cd src/backend && python3 api_server.py" --names "frontend,backend" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.dev-backend: source venv/bin/activate && cd src/backend && python3 api_server.py
scripts.setup-python: python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip3 install -r requirements.txt
